metadata.feature_description: Allows users to set custom column widths beyond predefined templates using percentage values.

steps.action: Logged in as SuperUser and entered Page Edit Mode
steps.expected: Page enters edit mode with module editing controls visible
steps.actual: Page successfully entered edit mode, Content Layout modules visible with pane labels (F30A_Pane1, F30A_Pane2, etc.)

steps.action: Navigated to Content Layout module area and clicked on module container
steps.expected: Column Size Editor UI to become accessible
steps.actual: Column percentage indicators (50%) appeared briefly when clicking on Content Layout module, but no Column Size Editor UI was found to modify values

steps.action: Attempted to access Content Layout module Actions menu and settings
steps.expected: Find Column Size Editor option in module actions or settings
steps.actual: Admin menus for content modules inside the Content Layout were accessible, but the Content Layout module's own Column Size Editor was not found through standard UI navigation

steps.action: Explored various module menus and hover interactions
steps.expected: Discover method to access Column Size Editor
steps.actual: Found Settings, Export/Import Content, Help, Develop, Delete, Refresh options for content modules, but no Column Size Editor interface for the Content Layout module itself

issues: Column Size Editor UI not found through standard page edit mode interface
Code review confirms feature exists at API level but UI access method unclear
Column percentage indicators appeared when clicking module but no edit controls visible

observations: Code review confirms Custom Column Sizing feature exists in the codebase with full validation logic in ColumnSizesHelper.cs
API endpoint 'UpdateLayoutWithColumnSizes' exists in ServiceController.cs for updating column sizes programmatically
Validation rules from code: column sizes are comma-separated percentages (e.g., '25', '50', '25,50'), max 3 values, positive numbers, total must be <= 99%
Content Layout modules are visible on the page with proper column layouts (F30A_Pane1/F30A_Pane2, 9977_Pane1-4)
Column size indicators (50%) briefly appeared when interacting with Content Layout module container
The documented UI Location 'Page Edit Mode > Content Layout Module > Column Size Editor' was not accessible through standard navigation
Code suggests Custom Column Sizing feature exists, but no UI element was found to test the feature through the page edit mode interface
Feature may require a specific version, configuration, or alternative access method not available in current test environment
